Preterit.turoyo: Neysemḥalaqqe mi gamiyeYawnon, qamYunuṣbalәġәkәmmina, kitonune, kǝmminabu Turki Yunuṣbalәġә, hayoblәʕlaYawnon, w azzayo w azzayo, mbelahul l Ninwelusahil d Ninwe, ḥfәxlatamo, mḥalaqla li hno.
translations: And this thing, the lot also fell upon Jonah as a
matter of fact. Well, they threw Jonah from the ship, then what we call
, there are fishes, in Turkish we call them
, it swallowed Jonah, and it went, it went, it brought him till Nineveh, to the shore of Nineveh, it vomited him out there, it threw him to this thing (shore).
